properties.entry: /* 유저 재화 라벨*/ SELECT U.COIN FROM USER_INFO U WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT UI.USER_NO , CR.CROP_NAME , RC.CROP_AMOUNT , UI.COIN , CR.CROP_PRICE FROM USER_INFO UI, RETAIN_CROP RC, CROP CR WHERE UI.USER_NO = RC.USER_NO AND CR.CROP_ID = RC.CROP_ID AND UI.USER_NO = ? AND CR.CROP_ID = 1
UPDATE RETAIN_CROP SET CROP_AMOUNT = CROP_AMOUNT - ? WHERE CROP_ID = 1 AND USER_NO = ?
UPDATE USER_INFO SET COIN = COIN + ((? * ?) / 10) WHERE USER_NO = ?
